pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging

content.raw:
default behaviour is updated [6765792](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/6765792554857c8e325b70d3ea540b92e7f103e0?at=default), following the tutorial [here](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=logging_playback): 

```
gazebo -r PATH_TO_WORLD_FILE.world
```
will behave exactly as what it was before and no models will be saved. 

When we would like to save the models, use the following command: 
```
gazebo -r --record_with_model PATH_TO_WORLD_FILE.world
```

This usage case is also added to `gazebo help`
content.html:
default behaviour is updated 6765792, following the tutorial here: 

gazebo -r PATH_TO_WORLD_FILE.world

will behave exactly as what it was before and no models will be saved.

When we would like to save the models, use the following command: 

gazebo -r --record_with_model PATH_TO_WORLD_FILE.world

This usage case is also added to gazebo help
